node.title: Canelo Álvarez delivered on his promise for a knockout victory.
node.alt: Canelo Álvarez after knocking down Caleb Plant a second time to win their super middleweight title unification fight.
node.description: He is the first man to unify boxing’s 168-pound belts.
node.content: ["Canelo \u00c1lvarez said earlier this week that he would knock out Caleb Plant before the eighth round. He was wrong.", "He knocked Plant out in the 11th round.", "Canelo \u00c1lvarez became the undisputed super middleweight champion on Saturday night in Las Vegas and cemented his status as the best pound-for-pound fighter in the world with a fight that was both calculated and decisive.", "As is his habit, \u00c1lvarez began the fight slowly. He landed a few punches but mostly waited, watched, gathered data and turned up the heat on Plant.", "By the 11th round, it was clear that \u00c1lvarez would win on the judges\u2019 scorecards and that Plant\u2019s only hope was to score a knockout. Instead it was \u00c1lvarez who threw a left hook followed by an uppercut that sent Plant down to the canvas on one knee.", "Plant got up and told the referee he wanted to continue, but as soon as the fight resumed, \u00c1lvarez pounced immediately and pummeled Plant into the ropes. He could not escape, and the referee was forced to end the fight."]
